events.message: I received my order last week but the item is not what I expected. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request for refund has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on their message.
The case has been assigned to support agent Rachel Smith to handle the refund request.
Hello! This is Rachel from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can proceed with the process?
My order number is 456789. The product I received was not the color described on your website, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. I have processed your refund request and you should receive the refund within 5 to 7 business days.
Thank you for the quick help! I appreciate how fast you handled my refund request.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please reach out if there is anything else we can help with.
We are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting customer service and we hope to assist you in the future.
